summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PsyTech APScheduler cron job, AI post generation, and blog functionality. All 19 backend tests passed (100%). Frontend blog/insights page and admin dashboard fully functional.
passed_tests: Scheduler status endpoint - returns running status, job info, next run time (3/3 passed)
AI post generation endpoint - triggers background task (2/2 passed)
Published posts GET /api/posts - pagination, search, tag filter, language filter (6/6 passed)
Single post GET /api/posts/{slug} - returns post details (2/2 passed)
Admin posts GET /api/admin/posts - returns all posts including drafts (2/2 passed)
Admin CRUD - create, publish, unpublish, delete post cycle (1/1 passed)
Blog/Insights page at /insights - displays 3 posts with AI-generated images
Blog post detail page - shows full content, tags, AI Generated badge
Admin dashboard - 4 tabs (All Posts, Drafts, Published, AI Generated)
Generate AI Post button - triggers background task with toast notification
Create Post dialog - all form fields working

scheduler_verification.job_name: Generate AI blog post twice weekly

ai_posts_verified: Enhancing Accuracy in AI-Driven Mental Health Assessment (published)
Utilising AI to Mitigate Mental Health Waiting Lists (draft)
context_for_next_testing_agent: APScheduler cron job is configured and running. AI posts are auto-published when generated. Make.com webhook is triggered on publish. Test file /app/backend/tests/test_scheduler_ai.py contains 19 pytest tests covering scheduler status, AI generation, posts CRUD, and admin endpoints.
